scripts.prepare-css: npm run smui-theme-light && npm run smui-theme-dark && npm run site-light && npm run site-dark
scripts.smui-theme-light: mkdir -p static/css && smui-theme compile static/css/smui.css -i src/theme
scripts.smui-theme-dark: mkdir -p static/css && smui-theme compile static/css/smui-dark.css -i src/theme/dark
scripts.site-light: mkdir -p static/css && sass --no-source-map -I src/theme -I node_modules -I ../smui-theme/node_modules -I ../../node_modules src/site.scss static/css/site.css
scripts.site-dark: mkdir -p static/css && sass --no-source-map -I src/theme/dark -I node_modules -I ../smui-theme/node_modules -I ../../node_modules src/site.scss static/css/site-dark.css
